definition: to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Her only resorts when she is alone are sewing and watching TV.
sentences.chinese: 当她单独一人时，唯一可做的事是做针线和看电视。

sentences.english: Sit in at the knitting circle down at the yarn shop.
sentences.chinese: 在纱支小店里围坐一圈做做针线。

sentences.english: The girls were chattering away over their needle work.
sentences.chinese: 女孩子们一面做针线一面喋喋不休。

sentences.english: Once, I had taught her how to read, how to sew, how to plant nasturtiums.
sentences.chinese: 我曾经教她读书，做针线，种植旱金莲。

definition: needlework/working for a living as a needleworker
erhua variant of 做活[zuo4 huo2]
flying needle and running seam (idiom); skillful needlework
wife of mother's brother/aunt/maternal uncle's wife
to work for a living (esp. of woman needleworker)/life of a group of stones in Go 圍棋|围棋[wei2 qi2]
